name: Wasteland Instincts
description:
This is a game about music & your hearing sense

_____________________________

Goal: Use your instincts to make your way back home through the wastelands. Follow the secure path that is indicated by a sound!

Listen carefully:

  • Major chord (happy and simple sounding chord) ==> You are on the right way! Walk on!
  • Minor chord (sad, or 'serious' sounding chord) ==> You have left the secure path. Get back on the secure path!

Proceed carefully:

  • Only take small steps.
  • Stop and change direction as soon as you can hear a minor chord.

Control: Arrow keys
